name: Real Estate
description: Automate property inquiries, schedule viewings, and match clients to listings instantly with BasaltCRM's predictive engine.
meta_title: Best AI CRM for Real Estate | BasaltCRM
meta_description: Real Estate CRM for agents and brokerages with automated lead capture, property-matching AI, tour scheduling, workflows, and compliance tooling.
subheading: Grow listings, shorten cycles, delight buyers and sellers

core: Unified contacts, properties, listings, and offers
Omnichannel capture (web forms, portals, email, phone, chat)
Predictive lead scoring and intent detection
Custom pipelines and multi-stage approval flows
Tasks, notes, mentions, and activity timelines
Advanced search, filters, and saved views
Role-based access control and team workspaces
Open API and Webhooks for extensibility
analytics: KPI dashboards for pipeline, conversion, and cycle times
Forecasting by segment, agent, team, and region
Cohort analysis and churn risk insights
ai_agents: Inbound triage agent for new inquiries
Outbound nurture agent for cold/warm leads
Scheduling agent for tours and meetings
Support agent for FAQs and knowledge base

automation_playbooks: Property match suggestions → tour scheduling → feedback capture
Offer pipeline movement → signature → close checklist
Post-close nurture → referral program → repeat listings

capabilities: Data subject rights tooling (export, delete, rectify)
Encryption at rest and in transit

pricing_overview.model: Flat rate per organization, unlimited users and contacts

support_sla.standard: Business hours, 24–48h response, knowledge base access
support_sla.premium: 24/7 support, 1–4h response, dedicated CSM, quarterly reviews

faqs.a: Yes. Kubernetes/Helm supported. Cloud hosting also available.
Yes. REST and Webhooks with scoped tokens and rate limits.
Yes. Email, messaging, pipelines, and dashboards templates included.
AI uses organization-specific signals; no cross-tenant data mixing.
